title: Add visible Admin Panel button to navigation

requirements.text: Add a clearly visible 'Admin Panel' button/link in the main navigation header (Header.tsx) that navigates to the admin route (#/admin). The button should be consistently accessible on both desktop and mobile navigation menus, styled to match the existing maroon/gold theme.

quotes: Admin panel button not found in page
Admin Panel button is missing from the page navigation

acceptanceCriteria: An 'Admin Panel' link/button is visible in the desktop navigation bar
An 'Admin Panel' link/button is visible in the mobile navigation menu
Clicking the button navigates the user to the #/admin route
The button is styled consistently with the existing maroon/gold theme
The button is present without requiring the user to manually type a URL

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
Preserve existing admin authentication flow â€” the button should only navigate to #/admin; login/guard logic remains unchanged
nonGoals: Changing the admin authentication or password logic
Modifying the AdminPanel or AdminLogin components
Adding new admin features or tabs
